body: Lmao-ing at the clowns in the comment section. The day I find a partner like this is the day I can finally die happy.
This is a very abusive relationship the reverse of this would be demonized and he doesn't really seem to actually be ok with this he has Stockholm syndrome.

Falkor83: There's a longform manga series that just wrapped up last year you may like called Nana & Kaoru. It's not pornographic, but it walks that line so well Johnny Cash would be proud.
